code: var getDataApi=function getDataApi(){return fetch('https://hp-api.onrender.com/api/characters').then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(data){var cleanData=data.map(function(eachCharacter){return{image:eachCharacter.image,name:eachCharacter.name,species:eachCharacter.species,house:eachCharacter.house,gender:eachCharacter.gender,ancestry:eachCharacter.ancestry,actor:eachCharacter.actor,alive:eachCharacter.alive,id:eachCharacter.id};});return cleanData;});};export default getDataApi;
